text: The Absent-Minded Professor is a 1961 Disney movie directed by Robert Stevenson. It stars Fred MacMurray, Leon Ames, Nancy Olsen, Keenan Wynn, and Tommy Kirk. It is a family-oriented comedy about a professor who invents "flubber", an anti-gravity substance. Category:Disney movies Category:1961 movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Stevenson
title: The Absent-Minded Professor
